title: varamiyyavayya
sahitya:
varamiyyavayya dhara nAyaka


anupallavi

  sharadindu shEkhara mitra shrIdhara pApa hara shara cApa kara


caraNam 1    paramArthikamau panulella mAni ghOramaina pApa krtyamula salpucu
vArAnganA jArulai tirigE sAra hInulanu sannuti sEyani
    caraNam 2    vara nAradAdi sura yaKSa kinnarulu nErccina vara sangIta svara
saukhyamu lerugalEni dhara nara jIvunalu smariyincani
    caraNam 3    puruSOttama shrI varada venkaTEsha karuNA kaTAkSa kari 
rakSaka shrI hari hari yani santatamu sthira cittamutO bhajiyincEDi
